title: S1/G4 ADC LF: Support to duo with

embed.description: DarkIllusion888 / Silver 2 6LP / 18W 21L Win Ratio 46% / Draven - 3W 3L Win Ratio 50%, Lucian - 3W 2L Win Ratio 60%, Xayah - 2W 2L Win Ratio 50%, Vayne - 2W 1L Win Ratio 67%, Miss Fortune - 2W 1L Win Ratio 67%

body: I've recently gotten back into league after a bit of a break and have decided to aim to become the world's best Xayah by mid-October, and am playing on this account for now. Looking for someone that's willing to play support with me. Most preferred support is Nami and least preferred support is Lux.
